about_the_game:
PLAY THIS NEW CONCEPT OF HORROR PUZZLE SURVIVAL GAME!


Trapped on the subway tracks with an earthquake threatening your life, must escape from the subway tunnel and station about to collapse. Some paranormal things might be happening! Solve the puzzles, avoid, collect things and use enviroment. Play alone this First Person Horror survival strategy puzzle game and made yourself a quake survivor...
In this captivating story you will embody a person who was on his way to work on the city subway when unexpectedly some gas pipes exploded in a nearby place due to a human error and generated an earthquake never seen before, destroying all the place. Unfortunately as the only survivor of the event, must find a way to escape without dying.
Using your enviroment and solving puzzles you will be able to advance and complete the game using an interactive first person mechanic and great graphics.
Made with Unreal Engine, this First person puzzle survival game its a new concept experience that you will enjoy playing offline singleplayer in inmersive horror enviroment. There's only one way to escape, you must use your tools wisely.

OBJETIVES

  • Escape from the tunnel and the train station about to collapse
  • Find keys , use enviroment and solve puzzles to advance
  • Use your intelligence and creativity with the clues that we left for you

FEATURES:

  • High quality graphics
  • Original music made by us
  • Creepy horror Enviroment and sound
  • Inmersive atmosphere
  • Interactive Gameplay with First person mode
  • Puzzles to solve and clues
  • Graphics and control settings
  • Shocking story
